typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CEDULA as string,
		NOMBRES as string,
		APELLIDOS as string,
		DIRECCION_CASA as string,
		DIRECCION_OFICINA as string,
		TELEFONO_CASA as string,
		TELEFONO_OFICINA as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
